DOC.brief_summary: The functional assessment hip joint complex challenging . Reproducible measure necessary identify change structure functionality hip joint time evaluate outcome treatment . A systematic evaluation process critical evidence-based practice . However , study investigate reproducibility measure muscle strength , range motion ( ROM ) hip functionality healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Intraobserver Interobserver Reproducibility Hip Clinical Assessment
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty subject randomize two different day : ( 1 ) First evaluation muscle strength , range motion single-leg squat perform evaluator 1 ; ( 2 ) Repeat first evaluation 3 different evaluator
